title.text2: Unlocking Opportunities for Growth and Success

about.title:
I'm Mohammad Baqer Kohie
Full-Stack Developer
about.desc: Hello, I am Mohammad Baqer Kohie, full-stack web developer. I bring the best version of your website or web application to the online world. My goal is to enhance user experience and improve the efficiency of your business. With creative ideas and the use of advanced and up-to-date technologies, I will be with you on this journey to create the best outcome for you and your work and business.

experiance.text: Active participation in several team-based open-source projects.
Developing multiple web projects, including a chat application and an online store website.

item.tittle: Institute for sales and support of entrance exam packages
